cause.description:
A group for anyone who agrees that John McCain should be elected the next President of the United States.
1. It is in the best interest for America to vote republican.
2. If Obama is elected the founding fathers will roll over in their graves.
3. We as Americans have to keep the moral integrity of our country intact.
cause.mission: Our mission: Keep a liberal out of the White House.
cause.name: Keep it Republican in '08
